thread.title_full: WATCH: EastEnders release alternative ending for Ronnie and Roxy where Ronnie survives!

author: Olivia Waring
title: WATCH: EastEnders release alternative ending for Ronnie and Roxy where Ronnie survives!
text:
Roxy and Ronnie are no longer with us, but one of them might have been (Picture: BBC) EastEnders has left its viewers shattered not once but twice after posting an alternative ending to Ronnie and Roxy Mitchellâ€™s deaths. 
EastEndersâ€™ Samantha Womack and Rita Simons left â€˜brokenâ€™ by Ronnie and Roxy death scene The macabre finale to last nightâ€™s episode showed them both drowning in a pool after Ronnie tried to save her drunk sister, while still in her wedding dress.
Now via their Snapchat, the soap has released an another version of this ending, which was apparently shot in full.
After the shock of losing both characters, fans were left even more upset by the idea Ronnie alone could have survived and found her sister lying face down on a pool table.
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
The clip shows Ronnie absolutely devastated after she and new hubby Jack find Roxy dead, with the older sister sliding down a hospital wall in tears.
Ronnie finds Roxy, then has a meltdown in hospital, during the alternative clip (Pictures: BBC) So Eastenders out here playing with people's hearts by posting alternative endings ? 
â€” âœŒ (@SugaSpixe) January 2, 2017 

@ Sam_Womack so gutted Ronnie and Roxy are gone, such iconic characters that didn't deserve to die, would preferred the alternative end ðŸ˜¥

â™¡â™¡â™¡ (@LibraKid25) January 01, 2017 Not only did Ronnie and Roxy both die, but I fully added bbc1 on snapchat to see an alternative ending that was 10seconds and RONNIE LIVED 
â€” Davidâ„¢ (@David_Adewale) January 1, 2017 
A horrible screen grab from the actual episode shows the sisters suspended in water (Picture: BBC) Others wanted to see more of the other ending, annoyed the clip was only five seconds long. Wtf was that? A 5 second video? I hope they give us the full alternative ending #eastenders 
â€” Lucy (@LucyMiltonYT) January 1, 2017 
I hope they release a full version of the alternative ending because it goes too fast to see everything! #Eastenders 
â€” Josh Middleton (@Howdy_Simmer) January 1, 2017 
How would Roxy have died in the alternative one though?? Wish eastenders just released the full clips 
â€” emâœ¨ (@EE_clan) January 1, 2017 

No doubt the tragic deaths of the former Queen Vic barmaids will have a huge effect on Albert Square.
EastEnders continues tonight at 8pm on BBC One.
